title: My changes for season 10 drakes
body:
Hey i had an idea on how to change the dragons for season 10.
My idea is to remove the RNG and making the dragon buffs weaker while keeping the dragon important a
nd implementing the mapchanges that riot already anounced.
If Riot would remove elemental drakes again and bring back the old drake system a bit different like:
1. drake: grants +15 bonus movement speed while out of combat
2. drake:  Every 18 seconds, restores 10% of missing health and 10% of missing mana.
3. drake: Grants +10% bonus true damage to epic monsters and turrets.
4. drake: Grants +8 / 16 / 24 (based on Stacks)% attack damage and ability power.
The 5. drake then gives the temporary dragon soul buff like it used to.

After ether a team gets:
-their 3. drake
-has the most drakes after 20 min
-slay the first drake after 20 min 
they get to vote out of the 4 map changes and the one with the most votes will occur (if the vote is not clear the system wil chose for the team out of the drakes who got the same amount of votes).

I think with this change the game will feel a lot less RNG based and will also not fu** bot-/toplane to much over.

Its just an idea but the current changes that i see on pbe right now are in my opinion just awefull ^^{{champion:102}}
